examples: […]  sodium chloride was discriminated significantly better after a pretaste of distilled water, hot bouillon, hot coffee (1% level), or tomato juice (5% level), than after milk, apple juice, or raw apple.

verbs.description: pretaste (third-person singular simple present pretastes, present participle pretasting, simple past and past participle pretasted)

entries.meaning: To take a previous or initial taste.
